titleStmt.title: A comparison betweene the auncient fayth of the Romans, and the new Romish religion. Set foorth by Frauncis Bunny, sometime fellowe of Magdalen College in Oxforde
titleStmt.author: Bunny, Francis, 1543-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Robinson for Raph Jackeson.,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Auncient Roman faith compared with the new Romish religion.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
